ThingShape.description: Provides a set of statistical monitoring services. To use these services, create a Thing and attach this ThingShape. This component is installed with ThingWorx but is not active until the DescriptiveAnalytics microservice is installed.
ThingShape.name: StatisticalMonitoringThingShape

ServiceDefinition.description: Monitor for the number of consecutive points in a series that remain inside or outside of a defined range.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetNumberOfConsecutivePointsBasedOnARange

ResultType.description: Maximum number of consecutive points in a series that remain inside or outside of a defined range.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: The range max is inclusive (Default is True)
FieldDefinition.name: includeMax

FieldDefinition.description: The range min is inclusive (Default is True)
FieldDefinition.name: includeMin

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum value of the range.
FieldDefinition.name: max

FieldDefinition.description: The minimum value of the range.
FieldDefinition.name: min

FieldDefinition.description: Number of data points to inspect.
FieldDefinition.name: numberOfPoints

FieldDefinition.description: Property Name.
FieldDefinition.name: propertyName

FieldDefinition.description: Calculate the number of points from INSIDE or OUTSIDE the range (inclusive).
FieldDefinition.name: regionOfInterest

ServiceDefinition.description: Monitor for the number of consecutive points in a series that are above or below a defined threshold.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetNumberOfConsecutivePointsBeyondAThreshold

ResultType.description: The number of consecutive points in a series that are below or above a threshold, inclusive.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: Either ABOVE or BELOW the threshold (inclusive).
FieldDefinition.name: direction

FieldDefinition.description: The threshold is inclusive (Default is True)
FieldDefinition.name: includeThreshold

FieldDefinition.description: Number of data points to inspect.
FieldDefinition.name: numberOfPoints

FieldDefinition.description: Property Name.
FieldDefinition.name: propertyName

FieldDefinition.description: The threshold to use for comparing points.
FieldDefinition.name: threshold

ServiceDefinition.description: Monitor for the number of consecutive points in a series that are increasing, decreasing, or alternating direction.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetNumberOfConsecutivePointsFollowingATrend

ResultType.description: Maximum number of consecutive points in a series that are increasing, decreasing or alternating direction.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: Number of data points to inspect.
FieldDefinition.name: numberOfPoints

FieldDefinition.description: Property Name.
FieldDefinition.name: propertyName

FieldDefinition.description: Data trend to inspect.
FieldDefinition.name: trend

ServiceDefinition.description: Monitor for the number of points in a series that remain inside or outside of a defined range.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetNumberOfPointsBasedOnARange

ResultType.description: Maximum number of points in a series that remain inside or outside of a defined range.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: The range max is inclusive (Default is True)
FieldDefinition.name: includeMax

FieldDefinition.description: The range min is inclusive (Default is True)
FieldDefinition.name: includeMin

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum value of the range.
FieldDefinition.name: max

FieldDefinition.description: The minimum value of the range.
FieldDefinition.name: min

FieldDefinition.description: Number of data points to inspect.
FieldDefinition.name: numberOfPoints

FieldDefinition.description: Property Name.
FieldDefinition.name: propertyName

FieldDefinition.description: Calculate the number of points from INSIDE or OUTSIDE the range (inclusive).
FieldDefinition.name: regionOfInterest

ServiceDefinition.description: Monitor for the number of points in a series that are above or below a defined threshold.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetNumberOfPointsBeyondAThreshold

ResultType.description: The number of points in a series that are below or above a threshold, inclusive.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: Either BELOW or ABOVE.
FieldDefinition.name: direction

FieldDefinition.description: The threshold is inclusive (Default is True)
FieldDefinition.name: includeThreshold

FieldDefinition.description: Number of data points to inspect.
FieldDefinition.name: numberOfPoints

FieldDefinition.description: Property Name.
FieldDefinition.name: propertyName

FieldDefinition.description: The threshold to use for comparing points.
FieldDefinition.name: threshold

ServiceDefinition.description: Monitor how many pairs of points in a series have a change rate outside the defined range.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetNumberOfPointsWithChangeRateOutOfRange

ResultType.description: The number of pairs of consecutive points that have a change rate outside the defined range.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: The threshold percentage is inclusive (Default is True)
FieldDefinition.name: includeThresholdPercentage

FieldDefinition.description: The number of consecutive points in a series, counting back from the current point.
FieldDefinition.name: numberOfPoints

FieldDefinition.description: Property name
FieldDefinition.name: propertyName

FieldDefinition.description: The rate of change threshold, expressed as a percentage. Cannot be a negative value
FieldDefinition.name: thresholdPercentage

ServiceImplementation.description: Monitor for the number of consecutive points in a series that remain inside or outside of a defined range.
ServiceImplementation.name: GetNumberOfConsecutivePointsBasedOnARange

ServiceImplementation.description: Monitor for the number of consecutive points in a series that are above or below a defined threshold.
ServiceImplementation.name: GetNumberOfConsecutivePointsBeyondAThreshold

ServiceImplementation.description: Monitor for the number of consecutive points in a series that are increasing, decreasing, or alternating direction.
ServiceImplementation.name: GetNumberOfConsecutivePointsFollowingATrend

ServiceImplementation.description: Monitor for the number of points in a series that remain inside or outside of a defined range.
ServiceImplementation.name: GetNumberOfPointsBasedOnARange

ServiceImplementation.description: Monitor for the number of points in a series that are above or below a defined threshold.
ServiceImplementation.name: GetNumberOfPointsBeyondAThreshold

ServiceImplementation.description: Monitor how many pairs of points in a series have a change rate outside the defined range.
ServiceImplementation.name: GetNumberOfPointsWithChangeRateOutOfRange
